import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import awsconfig from'./aws-exports';// Your Amplify config file
import{Amplify,Auth}from'aws-amplify';import{withAuthenticator}from'@aws-amplify/ui-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";Amplify.configure(awsconfig);function App(){const[bitcoinPrice,setBitcoinPrice]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBitcoinPrice=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('https://your-lambda-api-url.com');setBitcoinPrice(response.data.bitcoin.usd);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching Bitcoin price:',error);}};fetchBitcoinPrice();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Bitcoin Price Prediction Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Current Bitcoin Price: $",bitcoinPrice?bitcoinPrice:'Loading...']})]});}export default withAuthenticator(App);// Wrap with authentication
